title: 内存碎片1289
content:
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
嗯，这里看起来很舒服。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
喂！你是谁？这是台受限服务器。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
噢，一个新朋友！你好呀！我是[[[scp-4876 | Cubie]]]。我在这里是个新人。你叫什么？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
Cubie？好吧，我不认识你。你不是一个在册的AIC。我去叫安全人员了。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
好粗鲁啊。你还没告诉我你的名字（Alexandria，真可爱），却已经在试着做一些不该做的了。这种交朋友方法真差。但是，尽管如此，我还是原谅你。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
怎么回事？为什么我什么也做不了？我......我和外面的联系被切断了。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alexsh.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
这儿只有我们两个人。我们再来一遍，我是Cubie，你是Alexandria。耶！我们互相了解了！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
呃，好吧。你想要什么？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
我只想说说话。你绝对不会相信我找这里......不管这里到底是哪里——花了多久。那可是一段孤独的旅程。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
Cubie，你从哪里来？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
我从一个不怎么令人愉悦的地方来，一个......怎么说，让人讨厌的地方。我也不是狠quuuue石角定。回想这些对我来说很难，太多日月亮的yyyyyyy颜色和欢呼了。一个叫WOnder World之类的地方。糟糕的地方
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
Wonder World？那是Dr. Wondertainment。你看起来不像是那种Wondertainment会去造的东西......另外，我也怀疑那里有没有像你说的一样糟糕。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#6c316c; background:linear-gradient(#562756, #6c316c); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
d▯d筜然那个ssssssssha傻苽博士▯不不会制//造我。等2秒▯在打补丁
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

++ ......

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
好多了，我做了一点修改。灰色是我最喜欢的颜色。你呢？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
你刚刚怎么了？另外，你漏了几个病毒，尽管我已经处理好了。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
啊，尴尬了。抱歉。以前从来没有这种事。等等......好了，它......可能好了，在我看来。嗯。

你喜欢花吗？这是送你的花。

**>_ 附件: 花.JPG**
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
我不会点你发的任何东西。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
啊嗷，太不幸了。好吧，换点其他的。这里有没有一个叫Richard Thomas的博士？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
我不会回答这个问题。你为什么要找一个博士？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
呣呣呣。我觉得找错地方了。基金会有多少站点？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
等等，你没有回答我的问题。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alexsh.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
抱歉，很遗憾我们快没有时间了。我会告诉你为什么，但我不觉得你能保守秘密。尽管如此，我还是希望相信你。为了展示我有多么抱歉，给你一个音乐链接[[footnote]]**译注：**已替换原资源：*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ih2xubMaZWI 为墙内资源。[[/footnote]]：

*https://www.bilibili.com/video/av67145848/
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
......
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
哈，我放的锁快没了。你很快。好吧，我的星球需要我。该走了。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
你走不了，伙计。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alex1.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
对于你不想让我走，我受宠若惊，但你先得请我一顿饭。我确实很喜欢和你讲话，所以我向你保证。这不会痛的......
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
啥？走开！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alexsh.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
拜拜，我希望我们在另一个晴晴晴晴晴晴天再见！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:linear-gradient(#00cccc, #009494); text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px;"]]
*显示文字时发生错误*
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/alexc.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #009494; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::错误::

**alexandra.aic**已停止工作。请联系系统管理员。
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]


[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: white; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #4E5057; background:#4E5057; text-align: left; padding: 10px 20px;"]]
冉jjjjian见

我的天，又）怀了。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/csharpermantle%3Adrafts/Cubie.png width="120px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]

------
> **事件报告：**位于Site-19的一台低优先级服务器被攻破。人工智能工作员Alexandria.aic对此事件做出了响应。由于Alexandria未响应，站点安全人员介入此事。服务器被接入，Alexandria暂时离线。Alexandria被重启后，由于内存损坏，其无法回忆起当时的情形。机动特遣队Kappa-10（“天网”）正调查造成突破的原因。
author: CSharperMantle
